description.narrative: The project is expected to generate a range of environmental and economic benefits related to the development of the clean energy, energy and resource efficiency project investments. Specifically, IFC's investment would: (i) improve the competitiveness of the Turkish economy by increasing the utilization of the energy, water and raw materials more efficiently; (ii) develop energy and resource efficiency and related externality investment projects, R&D investments across all sectors; and (iii) improve the local as well as the global environment through reduced emissions of conventional pollutants and GHGs.

mailing-address.narrative: TSKB Cigdem Icel Executive Vice President +90-212-334-5050 ICELC@tskb.com.tr Meclisi Mebusan Cad. 81 Findikli 34427 Istanbul www.tskb.com.tr

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
